This petition in to ask for a change in law to ban or restrict the use of Risperidone in any form; to be used especially on young adult of child bearing age, and to other older people who still have a useful life, ie; active life.
 The main problem with this drug is it permanently effects, especially sex life’s and cognitive functions to what would deem as a normal life for people with mental health problems. Many high ranking London (UK) psychiatrists believe this drug has side effect that far out-weigh the benefits.
The purpose of this petition it to restrict its use to older people over 55 years of age or an outright ban.
Risperidone cause complete sexual dysfunction and prevent the propagation of a family; rendering the patient unable to enjoy sex or have a family, the other side effects remain permanent, including tardis dyslexia and memory loss, destroying peoples lives.
Please support this petition if you have been affected of have a loved one affected by this drug.
